result.title: Bor algoritmi
result.content:
Algorithm
#include <bits/stdc++.h>

#define pb push_back
#define db double
#define all(c) (c).begin(), (c).end()
using namespace std;

const int N = 1e6 + 1;
const int mod = 1e9 + 7;
typedef pair<int, int> pii;

inline int read () {
    char c = getchar();
    int t = 0, f = 1;
    while (!isdigit(c)) f = (c == '-') ? -1 : 1, c = getchar();
    while (isdigit(c)) t = t * 10 + c - 48, c = getchar();
    return t * f;
}
int trie[3][500000] , cnt[3][500000];
main() {
    string s;
    cin >> s;
    int id = 1 , t = 1;
    for(int i = 0; i < s.size(); i ++){
        int c = s[i] - 'a';
        if(trie[c][id] == 0){
            trie[c][id] = ++ t;
        }
        cnt[c][id] ++;
        id = trie[c][id];
    }
    int q = read();
    while(q --){
        string a;
        cin >> a;
        int id = 1;
        for(int i = 0; i < a.size(); i ++){
            int c = a[i] - 'a';
            id = trie[c][id];
            if(id == 0)
                break;
        }
        cout << (id ? 1 : 0) << "\n";
    }
}
